description: the fig rig is truckin’ the same passion in their cuisine that can be found at the girl & the fig and the fig cafe (both renowned local favorites) straight to your door. And since their menu is made with local Sonoma ingredients, it figures that it's all so delicious. Whether it's a party, wedding, corporate event, or everyday shindig you're planning, your guests are sure to adore the fig rig’s eclectic selection of gourmet French country comfort food. With burgers, to ramen, to charcuterie, and beyond, (you’re even welcome to work with this talented team to customize the perfect menu just for you), you're sure to find that every one of their creations tastes utterly sensational. Whenever it's time for a Wine Country dining experience, the fig rig is ready to roll.
name: the fig rig
